mapper.select: select t.id, t.id_user, t.address, t.receiver, t.mobile, t.isdefault as 'isDefault', t.status, t.createdate as 'createDate', t.lastdate as 'lastDate' from user_address t where t.id_user = #{value} and t.status = '1'

select t.id, t.id_user, t.address, t.receiver, t.mobile, t.isdefault as 'isDefault', t.status, t.createdate as 'createDate', t.lastdate as 'lastDate' from user_address t where t.id_user = #{id_user} and t.id = #{id} and t.status = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into user_address( id_user, address, receiver, mobile, isdefault, status, createdate, lastdate )values( #{id_user}, #{address}, #{receiver}, #{mobile}, #{isDefault}, #{status}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update user_address set receiver = #{receiver},mobile = #{mobile},isdefault = #{isDefault},status = #{status},lastdate = now() where id_user = #{id_user} and id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete user_address where id_user = #{id_user} and id = #{id}
